# decodeTimeStamp

**Instance Property**

The time at which the sample will be decoded.

## Declaration

```swift
var decodeTimeStamp: CMTime
```

## Discussion

If the samples are in presentation order, this must be set to `kCMTimeInvalid`.

## Properties

- **duration**: The duration of the sample.
- **presentationTimeStamp**: The time at which the sample will be presented.
